alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 24 at 8:32PM EDT until September 25 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Ocean County, New Jersey. The minor tidal flooding will be confined mainly to Barnegat Bay and connected tidal waterways. * WHEN...Until 9:00 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor tidal flooding are possible into the new week.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
